## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run `go fmt ./...` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `goimports -w .` to organize imports

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run `go test -race ./...` and no race conditions were detected
- [ ] Code coverage is maintained or improved (>90%)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated godoc comments for exported functions
- [ ] I have added examples for new functionality
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md

### Security (if applicable)
- [ ] I have considered security implications of my changes
- [ ] I have not introduced any new security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have followed cryptographic best practices

### Breaking Changes (if applicable)
